head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ROSS, W. OGDEN

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ROSS, W. OGDEN

block.p: ROSS-W. Ogden. In Newport, RI, January 19, 2003. Husband of Anne Wotherspoon Ross. Father of Donald O. Ross, Philip L. Ross and Stuart C. Ross. Residence: Hammersmith Road, Newport, RI. Funeral services will be held at Trinity Church in Newport on Thursday, January 23, at 2 PM. In lieu of flowers, contributions may be directed to the Yale Class of 1943 60th Reunion Fund or the English Speaking Union, Newport Chapter.

In lieu of flowers, contributions may be directed to the Yale Class of 1943 60th Reunion Fund or the English Speaking Union, Newport Chapter.
